page.title: 14Jackson's the sweet factory
page.content: Jackson's is a sweet factory and it was first established in 1817. Where it was first established is now being turned into flats. It is now in the middle of the town. One of the workers has been there for twentytwo years. He started in 1963. He gets paid roughly Â£74.28 per week and gets some medicated sweets for his family and relations. Jackson's make medicated sweets, linseed sweets, cashews, pastilles and imps. They also take some of these sweets to shops for them to sell to the public.
